dialogue.introduction: I'm Shikinami. I'll be in your care.
dialogue.library_intro: Special Destroyer number II, Shikinami. Nice to meet you. After participating in Midway and the Battle of Solomon, I serve as a convoy escort. Being a convoy escort is really rough you know... Because it's important...
dialogue.secretary2: What is it, I'm busy here...
dialogue.secretary3: Don't call me if you don't have business with me... It's not like I hate it.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hurn, person like Shikinami will be forgotten anyway... Well, that's fine... that's not fine...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander… It's not good to work so hard. … Hey, take your time!
dialogue.wedding: Commander, yeah, I've got something I wanna tell you, nah, it's not a complaint or anything, you know? Erm.. Umm… man, I can't say it!
dialogue.show_players_score: It's the letter. Be sure to look at?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Well, let go~! It's time for sortie!
dialogue.equipment1: Eh? Is it all right to strengthen someone like me. It's nothing?
dialogue.equipment2: What is it, to invest toward someone like me... I-it's alright.
dialogue.supply: Huh? Are you fine with it, strengthening someone like me, that is. Nothing's gonna come out of this, you know?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yayy, well then I'll get myself repaired.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Haa, it's was dangerous. I'll go to the dock.
dialogue.docking_complete: The ship's repairs have finished. She's probably all pretty now, isn't she? Hurm.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship just joined. I bet she's a cute kid... hurm.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation completed. The fleet has returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Shikinami! Sailing! Don't worry about me.
dialogue.night_battle: Night battle huh... Well, it's fine because I'm good at it.
dialogue.night_attack: In the end, it's my turn huh.
dialogue.artillery_spotting: In the end, it's my turn huh.
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: In the end, it's my turn huh.
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: In the end, it's my turn huh.
dialogue.mvp: Commander! I'm awesome right? Right? Ah, no, I don't care about that at all...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Hurm, I don't that I'll lose because I'm worn out!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, it's the second anniversary ... I'm only a little happy. No, just a little bit ... yeah ...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: I am a bit upset about the Rainy Season, since I don't feel like going out as much. Well, I don't really mind, though. Yeah.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: It's summer, Commander. Wanna have some watermelon? Ah, I should bring some to Ayanami
dialogue.fall_2015: Uwaa, Already summer has ended. Autumn/Fall is somewhat lonely. It's not a problem, really
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas, huh. We... sort of bought you a present, Ayanami and I. You already recieved it? Oh, I see.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, it's New Year. Happy New Year! There's no New Year's Gift? Ah...is that so. Well, shall we go visit the shrine then?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun! I kinda like it since it's fun. I will throw at Ayanami... Eh, she's not here. Where are you!?
